ns0:Document.ns0:name: MODIS C61 USA (Conterminous) and Hawaii 24h Hotspots
ns0:Document.ns0:description:
This KML displays the MODIS active fire / thermal anomaly detections at a spatial resolution of 1km for the past 6 hours, 6-12 hours and 12-24 hours. Each 1km MODIS fire detection is depicted as a point representing the centroid of the approx. 1km pixel where the fire is detected.The 1km footprint of the MODIS pixel for each detection is also displayed.

Data current as of 2025-04-02 1840 UTC.. KML file generated by NASA Fire Information for Resource Management System (FIRMS).Please see https://firms.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov.

Disclaimer: The information provided through FIRMS are provided “as is” and users bear all responsibility and liability for their use of the data (see full disclaimer).
